title: Saw a pic a few minutes ago of a bride in a League loading screen before her wedding

replies.body:
That's amazing. \*takes notes*

I'm getting married next year and our tables are named after League champs. The family we don't like are sitting at Teemo. ;) I'm also walking up the aisle to Quinn & Valor's theme. ^-^

Congrats! 

If you don't hide a recording of teemo's laugh programmed to go off every 5 min at their table i'll be disappointed.

Thanks! 

I feel like this is a ~~horrible~~ awesome idea.
The more I read, the more I wish I could see this wedding because it sounds so awesome.
You should walk up the aisle to the song of Bard, his majestic shrieks of eternal glory.
** TOOT BOOM WHAAAAAANG** \*people crying\*
LOL.
Clearly should be the first dance song. :P
Is there like an evil stepmom in either family? Play Veigar's theme when she arrives.
Unfortunately, she's really nice. (Unfortunately? xD)

Then play Tidecaller!

Hmmm...are there any tough guys? Maybe Sion's theme would fit XD

fk teemo

Is there a mushroom centerpiece?
We're putting mushroom accents in the flowers. :P
Good enough for me, that's awesome.

not diana's login theme?  still easily my favorite.

edit: wait a sec, youre getting MARRIED? congrats! :D

That's a good one! It's actually included in the music that's playing when people are getting settled/seated. 

Also, thank you! ^-^
be careful, before long the entire community will demand a video of your wedding lol

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KOZ8ckUf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-16T00:39:33.062+0000)
>
> The family we don't like are sitting at Teemo. ;)

LOL
Awesome, congratulations!
Ummmm....We all know last years URF theme is the only acceptable wedding music.
Hell yeah, gotta win those promos.
